About Us

What's so great about a mathmetician from the Middle Ages? Fibonacci created the greatest sequence of numbers in history, where each one equals the sum of the two numbers before it(1,1,2,3,5,8 - you get it). A thousand years since his death, people have noticed this sequence in nature, applied it in business and architecure, and created music inspired by its pattern. We think thats pretty cool

For the last 3 years, Fibonacci's has served a sequence of good food to anyone who enjoys a nerdy pun. Now were expanding to bring you a food truck! Enjoy Fibonacci's at local events or book us for a neighborhood special occasion.

Fibonacci's is owned by Paula Delfino and inspired by her father Raul, a retired teacher who taught with great knowledge in the classroom and a wacky sense of humor

enjoy Fibonaccis's fan favorite menu items at loocal events or book us for a vist to your neighborhood or special occasions.

Location and Hours

    The Fibonacci's Quarterly Menu

    Wraps

    The Number 1

    Buffalo chicken, romaine lettuce, carrots, ranch, blue cheese

    The Other Number 1

    Vegetarian, Hummus, romaine lettuce, sun-dried tomatoes, Kalamata olives, feta cheese, tzatziki sauce

    The Number 2

    Jalapeno tortilla, turkey chili, onions, cheddar cheese, avocado

    The Number 3

    Smoked salmon, cream cheese, cucumber, dill, and baby spinach

    The Number 5

    Marinated pork, pickled carrots, cucumber, cilantro, mint, fresno chiles, mayonnaise

    The Number 8

    Vegatarian, Falafel, red onion, romaine lettuce, tomato, and tzatziki sauce

    * All wraps, except, The Number 2 are served on your choice of flour or corn tortilla.

    Sides

    Sequence Fries

    Just a side of fries

    Cheese Fries

    Fries topped with havarti and dill cheese, pastrami, russian dressing pickled onions and peppers, jalapenos

    Golden Ratio

    Fries topped with turkey chili and queso blanco

    Consecutive Chips

    Tortilla chips and salsa verde

    Fibonaccis Food Truck and Restaurant

    About Us

    What's so great about a mathmetician from the Middle Ages? Fibonacci created the greatest sequence of numbers in history, where each one equals the sum of the two numbers before it(1,1,2,3,5,8 - you get it). A thousand years since his death, people have noticed this sequence in nature, applied it in business and architecure, and created music inspired by its pattern. We think thats pretty cool

    For the last 3 years, Fibonacci's has served a sequence of good food to anyone who enjoys a nerdy pun. Now were expanding to bring you a food truck! Enjoy Fibonacci's at local events or book us for a neighborhood special occasion.

    Fibonacci's is owned by Paula Delfino and inspired by her father Raul, a retired teacher who taught with great knowledge in the classroom and a wacky sense of humor

    enjoy Fibonaccis's fan favorite menu items at loocal events or book us for a vist to your neighborhood or special occasions.
